name: vision-smash-code
description: Add cursor trail effects, window animations, and gradient theme effects to VS Code, making your coding experience more vivid and interesting!

commands.title: Vision Smash Code: OpenSettings - 打开设置

visionSmashCode.base.cursor.description:
Enable Cursor Effects
  启用光标特效

visionSmashCode.base.animations.description:
Enable window animations
  启用窗口动效

visionSmashCode.base.gradient.description:
Enable gradient theme effects
  启用主题渐变效果

visionSmashCode.base.mouse.description:
Enable mouse tail effects
  启用鼠标尾迹效果

configuration.title: Cursor Effects - 光标特效设置

visionSmashCode.cursor.tailColor.description:
Trail color (hex)
  拖尾颜色 (十六进制)

visionSmashCode.cursor.useShadow.description:
Enable glow
  辉光开关 (略微影响性能)

visionSmashCode.cursor.shadowColor.description:
Glow color (hex, suggested to match tail color)
  辉光颜色 (十六进制，建议使用拖尾颜色)

visionSmashCode.cursor.tailOpacity.description:
Tail opacity (0-1)
  拖尾不透明度 (0-1)

visionSmashCode.cursor.shadowBlurFactor.description:
Shadow blur factor
  模糊系数 (倍数)

visionSmashCode.cursor.animationLength.description:
Animation length (seconds)
  标准动画时长 (秒)

visionSmashCode.cursor.shortAnimationLen.description:
Short animation length (seconds)
  短距离位移动画时长 (秒)

visionSmashCode.cursor.shortMoveThreshol.description:
Short move threshold (pixels)
  短距离位移阈值 (像素)

visionSmashCode.cursor.rank0TrailFactor.description:
Trailing point speed factor (multiplier)
  最拖尾角点速度因子 (倍数)

visionSmashCode.cursor.rank1TrailFactor.description:
Secondary trailing point speed factor (multiplier)
  次拖尾角点速度因子 (倍数)

visionSmashCode.cursor.rank2TrailFactor.description:
Following point speed factor (multiplier)
  次领先角点速度因子 (倍数)

visionSmashCode.cursor.rank3TrailFactor.description:
Lead point speed factor (multiplier)
  最领先角点速度因子 (倍数)

visionSmashCode.cursor.useHardSnap.description:
Enable teleport snapping
  瞬移开关 (起稳定器的作用)

visionSmashCode.cursor.leadingSnapFactor.description:
Teleport snap factor (multiplier)
  瞬移系数 (倍数)

visionSmashCode.cursor.leadingSnapThresh.description:
Teleport snap threshold (0-1)
  瞬移判定阈值 (0-1)

visionSmashCode.cursor.animationResetThr.description:
Animation reset threshold (seconds)
  动画重置阈值 (秒)

visionSmashCode.cursor.maxTrailDistanceF.description:
Max stretch factor
  最大拉伸 (倍数)

visionSmashCode.cursor.snapAnimationLeng.description:
Snap animation duration (seconds)
  瞬移时长 (秒)

visionSmashCode.cursor.cursorUpdatePolli.description:
Cursor update polling rate (ms)
  扫描频率 (毫秒，影响性能，不建议小于100)

visionSmashCode.cursor.cursorDisappearDe.description:
Tail disappear delay (ms)
  拖尾消失延迟 (毫秒)

visionSmashCode.cursor.cursorFadeOutDura.description:
Tail fade out duration (seconds)
  拖尾渐隐时长 (秒)

configuration.title: Animation Settings - 调整窗口时的动效设置

visionSmashCode.animations.Smooth-Mode.markdownDescription:
Enable smooth animations for all windows (sidebar, splits, etc.) when resizing (high performance cost).
  是否让所有窗口（侧边栏、分屏等）在调整窗口时启用平滑动画（性能消耗较大）。

visionSmashCode.animations.Tokens.description:
Enable word float on hover
  鼠标悬置单词上时单词浮动

visionSmashCode.animations.Command-Palet.description:
Animation used for command palette (Shift+P)
  命令面板(Shift+P)使用的动画

visionSmashCode.animations.Tabs.description:
Animation used for tabs
  选项卡使用的动画

visionSmashCode.animations.Active.description:
Animation for active list items
  选中列表项时的动画

visionSmashCode.animations.Scrolling.description:
Animation for newly appearing list items while scrolling
  在滚动时新出现的列表项使用的动画

visionSmashCode.animations.Default-Durat.markdownDescription:
Default duration for all animations (ms), default: `300`. **Note:** You can set per-animation durations in the `Durations` section.
  所有动画的默认时长（毫秒），默认：`300`。**注意：** 这是所有动画的默认时长，你可以在 `Durations` 部分为每个动画单独设置时长。

Command-Palette.markdownDescription:
Command palette animation duration (ms), default: `300`
  命令面板动画时长（毫秒），默认：`300`

Tabs.markdownDescription:
Tabs animation duration (ms), default: `200`
  标签页动画时长（毫秒），默认：`200`

Active.markdownDescription:
Active item animation duration (ms), default: `200`
  活动项动画时长（毫秒），默认：`200`

Scrolling.markdownDescription:
Scrolling animation duration for newly appearing items (ms), default: `200`
  滚动时新出现列表项的动画时长（毫秒），默认：`200`

Smooth-Mode.markdownDescription:
Smooth mode animation duration (ms), default: `200`
  平滑模式动画时长（毫秒），默认：`200`

visionSmashCode.animations.Custom-CSS.description:
Use custom CSS files
  是否使用自定义 CSS 文件

configuration.title: Theme Enhancements - 主题增强设置

visionSmashCode.gradient.editor-hover.description:
Enable editor hover glass effect
  启用编辑器悬浮提示框背景毛玻璃效果

visionSmashCode.gradient.git-num-icon.description:
Enable Git change number icon gradient
  启用 Git 变更数字图标渐变效果

visionSmashCode.gradient.linenumber-rain.description:
Enable line number rainbow glow
  启用行号彩虹辉光效果

visionSmashCode.gradient.quick-input.description:
Enable quick input gradient
  启用快速输入框渐变效果

visionSmashCode.gradient.text-glowing.description:
Enable text glowing
  启用文本发光效果

visionSmashCode.gradient.text-gradient.description:
Enable subtle text gradient
  启用文本微弱渐变效果

visionSmashCode.gradient.horizontal.description:
Enable horizontal drag bar gradient (buggy)
  启用水平拖动栏渐变效果(存在BUG)

visionSmashCode.gradient.top-active-tab.description:
Enable top active tab gradient
  启用顶部活动标签页渐变效果
